response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1,500,000, reflecting its unique qualities and craftsmanship. Considering its immense worth to you, we propose a price tailored to reflect its importance to both parties. We kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product at $1,200,000. This offer allows us to share the value we see in the product while ensuring it remains accessible to someone who appreciates it as much as we do. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
